data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
Vasco da Gama are coming forward and Ribamar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 6, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Botafogo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Botafogo throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 7, Bruno Nazario (Botafogo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
At Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos, Martin Benitez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 8, Botafogo's Bruno Nazario gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Botafogo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
In the minute 12, Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick in a good position for Vasco da Gama!
Botafogo's Rafael Forster has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama's Ribamar goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 17, Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Rio de Janeiro.
Yago Pikachu (Vasco da Gama) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Wilton Pereira Sampaio blows against Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno for offside.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 22, Rhuan of Botafogo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Botafogo drive upfield and Caio Alexandre gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
Matheus Babi (Botafogo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 22, Matheus Babi (Botafogo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Victor Luis gets his shot on target but fails to score for Botafogo.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Vasco da Gama are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 27, Fellipe Bastos for Vasco da Gama gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 28, Fellipe Bastos (Vasco da Gama) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Botafogo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Botafogo drive upfield and Kevin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
Fernando Miguel is back on his feet again.
In the minute 32, Wilton Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Fernando Miguel for Vasco da Gama is still down.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 33, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Matheus Babi's header is off-target for Botafogo.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Botafogo.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Ribamar is on target to give Vasco da Gama a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 36, Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 38, Vasco da Gama push forward at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos and Talles Magno gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Botafogo defence.
German Cano (Vasco da Gama) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama just outside Botafogo's area.
In the minute 40, Vasco da Gama's Martin Benitez breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Botafogo's Matheus Babi gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luiz Otavio is replacing Caio Alexandre for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Carlos Renteria is replacing Keisuke Honda for the home team.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Botafogo.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Botafogo throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 45, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 45, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama attack through Fellipe Bastos. The finish is off target, however.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos with Salomon Kalou replacing Marcelo Benevenuto.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Bruno Nazario of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Matheus Babi grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Bruno Nazario with an assist there.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 51, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ricardo Graca.
The away team has substituted Ricardo Graca with Miranda. Ramon Menezes is thus making his first change.
Kevin (Botafogo) has received a yellow card from Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
The match at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos has been interrupted briefly for a check on Leandro Castan, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 56, Victor Luis (Botafogo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Paulo Autuori (Botafogo) is making a fourth substitution, with Pedro Raul replacing Rhuan.
In the minute 58, The home team have replaced Kevin with Federico Barrandeguy. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
Ramon Menezes is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos with Ygor Catatau replacing Ribamar.
Leandro Castan for Vasco da Gama is back on the field again.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama surge into the attack at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos but Ygor Catatau’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 60, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 65, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Botafogo throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 69, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Botafogo's Bruno Nazario misses with an attempt on goal.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Vasco da Gama push upfield and German Cano gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Botafogo defence.
Goal! German Cano gives Vasco da Gama a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 73, Vasco da Gama take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Ygor Catatau.
That's a fine assist from Marcos Junior.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Botafogo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 79, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Botafogo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 81, In Rio de Janeiro Botafogo drive forward through Luiz Otavio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Botafogo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 82, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Pedro Raul (Botafogo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Botafogo are back in the match in Rio de Janeiro. Matheus Babi has scored to make it 2-3.
In the minute 83, Salomon Kalou instrumental with a fine assist.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Bruno Cesar is replacing Talles Magno for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 87, The away team have replaced Martin Benitez with Neto Borges. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
Matheus Babi for Botafogo drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Botafogo throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Botafogo.
The match has come to a close in Rio de Janeiro. The final score is 2-3.
